trans-unit.source: Graceful mode: If this mode is activated, the errors thrown during the dispatch of a notification will be catch. Please note that this feature should be used with caution; if you activate it, you should consider setting up a log service or something else to prevent losing all data related to the notification (see `\CuyZ\Notiz\Event\Runner\EventRunner::SIGNAL_EVENT_DISPATCH_ERROR`).
Enable TYPO3 events: Will load all TYPO3 related events that can be used to dispatch notifications.
Enable backend toolbar: Will add a toolbar to the header of the TYPO3 backend.
Toolbar index: Position index for the tool bar. Must be between 0 (left position) and 100 (right position).
